overview: Ruins Alone is Tatsuya Yoshida, one great artist who had a reputable name on the music scene in Japan. His visit to Yogyakarta last year was an opportunity to know him closely, literally. Either in his performance at Yes No Klub, his unique interest in old temples and ruins, or his mature and down-to-earth character. In 25 minutes, this film covers all of it, but also gives a chance to anyone who wants to know Tatsuya Yoshida, literally.
title: Ruins Alone in Jogjakarta
